### Conclusion

The table shows that Mark McCumber did not place in the "top - 5" only during the Masters Tournament. The PGA Championship has a non-zero count in the top 5 column, so it does not support the claim as an example where he didn't place at all in the top 5.

Thus, the claim is **FALSE** because the PGA Championship should not be included as one of the tournaments with no top-5 placements.
